source.class:
* Wrapper class to compute Jacobian matrices by finite differences for ODE * which do not compute them by themselves. $Id: ParameterJacobianWrapper.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 3.0
* Main ODE set.
* Raw ODE without Jacobian computation skill to be wrapped into a ParameterJacobianProvider.
* Steps for finite difference computation of the Jacobian df/dp w.r.t. parameters.
<declaration type="Map" name="hParam" />
* Wrap a {@link ParameterizedODE} into a {@link ParameterJacobianProvider}. fode main first order differential equations set pode secondary problem, without parameter Jacobian computation skill paramsAndSteps parameters and steps to compute the Jacobians df/dp JacobianMatrices#setParameterStep(String,double)
set up parameters for jacobian computation
* {@inheritDoc}
<method type="Collection" name="getParametersNames" startLine="67" endLine="69" />
* {@inheritDoc}
* {@inheritDoc}
compute the jacobian df/dp w.r.t. parameter
